title: Lol Patcher  Error :(
body:
Hi Guys Please i want Some Help i have problem of close program in Lol when i start It worked for like one night. Then the same things started faulting again. But when i enters event viewer i saw This Errors but i cant understand it can anyone help me please ??


_
Faulting application name: LoLPatcherUx.exe, version: 0.73.0.18, time stamp: 0x3b866bf0
Faulting module name: ntdll.dll, version: 6.1.7601.17514, time stamp: 0x4ce7b96e
Exception code: 0xc0000005
_Fault offset: 0x00055f1b_
Faulting process id: 0xad4
Faulting application start time: 0x01d2ec8d176ec713
Faulting application path: D:\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.0.87\deploy\LoLPatcherUx.exe
Faulting module path: C:\Windows\SYSTEM32\ntdll.dll
Report Id: 56b4bea3-5880-11e7-9176-20cf30de0f03_






And This is Some Photos :

http://imgur.com/a/I05ra


http://imgur.com/a/f2CqA

replies.body: Those event logs don't tell a whole lot, but if I understand correctly you're reporting that the patcher won't open when clicking the icon.  This can happen if you have security settings blocking League from opening.  Go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if that clears things up!
i Did it all bro but still crashes and appear Close program and this Errors i only can play The game only For one game and then Close program msg appear and i cant open the game again :s
